message.body: so my boss might be sending me to a conference here in NYC for the next 2 days
my chat is being all weird today
or just the last minute nature
and i have a boatload of work to do
so how about the Cuse responding last night
Kris Joseph is a rich man's Josh Pace
he's becoming my favorite player I think
scoop Jardine is really playing well too
he gets a little too amped up though
he also looks about 10lbs lighter...i think he's just in better shape
he is always due for a big TO at some point when we are on a run
but he has a great feel
him and triche play well together
is it it me or are you never satisfied with AO's performance? I always think he can do more
yes - but i have kind of altered my expectations
I honestly expect more out of Jackson now
I think oof AO as a 8 and 8 guy
Jackson finally played a good game last night
he had 3 or 4 games in a row where he shat the bed
but yes AO could do more
KJ is so much improved from last year
how about that rebound he took from Monroe
he is developing a nice game off the bounce too
him and Wes Johnson in a dunk contest would be sick
he is always pointing or staring to the crowd
they are a lot of fun to root for
I wonder why he sits on the bench sometimes for 10 minutes at a time
and when he gets in he usually plays well and unselfish
just got out of going to the conference
everytime I try to respond to email I get an error
Craig offered me Flyers tickets for Saturday night
you should screw the party and you and I could do that
how often do you chat with this guy?
no I haven't talked to him in months
but when I was refinancing it was right in the middle of the loan freeze
so it took us like 3 months to get it done
and we were talking a couple times a week
and you know I did two deals in 2 years
and have referred a couple other people to him
do you remember what negotiation points you asked for when you bought your house?
like...take $1,000 of the price of the house for x or y
I think at this point your only real leverage is based on the inspection right?
so anything you guys ask for has to be based off of that since you already made them an offer and they accepted
so with our inspection there were prob 5k worth of stuff that was kind of major
cause there is a ton of shit that was recommended to be fixed
ie fix the flashing around a gutter and little shit like that
we had some termite damage so we made them cover the cost of getting a treatment done
then we took I think 5k and asked them to split the costs i think
or maybe it was 6k and asked them to split
but they were also extremly difficult so we didnt want to ask too much
as a starting point I would look at the few things that you would need to do ASAP
look at what that number would be
then maybe just ask them to fix or take money off the final price
or split depending on how much it is estimated
like what kind of stuff would you guys like to get fixed right away
some outlets that aren't up to code
there's a cracked window in the basement
the washer and dryer are listed as "includes" but are wicked old and not hooked up (so we couldn't see if they work)
it can't hurt to ask them to fix/replace or offer money
what would you guess the grand total would be 2-3k?
cause of some insulation issues in the attic
I think blount is going to be a steal
can be a great compliment back
him and forsett could be nice
or him and spoles or mccoy
assuming he is something like a 3rd round choice
McCoy is the RB in Philly in case you are confused there too
yeah, the Eagles said westy will be back
so we will need another RB
even if we resign Weaver, which I hope we do
whats that called when some of the clsoing costs are folded into the mortgage again?
going to grab some lunch and bring back to my desk
i wish I had some Wendy's
I was leaning towards chic fila
you are obsessed with chic fila
i honestly don't think I've ever had it
there are 2 guys here trying to sell us discount office supplies
they are young kinds and are SO bad
got to love those door to door office sales people
it is literally like the scene from Office Space when the guy is selling magazines door-to-door
i'm on the fence about bball or combine
I would rather go to the bball game
but tickets might be pretty hard to come by
that's why i'm on the fencer
what happened to his Mom? that really sucks
but then she was doing real well
and she died of a embolism
I don't think I am meeting my Dad this year in New Orleans for the NCAA tourney
but that is a great weekend to get together
that's good cause I wouldn't be able to attend jf we buy a house anyways
yeah he is starting his radiation treatment so he isn't sure if he will be able to
so we will haev to keep that in mind
he should be good in a few months
did you get my message to Beft?
I thought about that this morning
I had every intention on saying it too
i had a shrimp and lobster ravioli in a butter/wine citrusy sauce
is it tougher to have a season like the Hawks
or a season like the Vikes when you get your heart ripped out so close to the ultimate goal?
I have such fond memories of 2005 even though we lost about as tough a loss as there is
i need to ask my Vikes fan
cause he was kind of expecting the worst
what are you doing for super bowl?
i honestly wouldn't mind doing nothing
Ben Sheets got a nice payday
yeah, a neice or nephew due in July
i just want to lay on my couch
it is annoying especially in the burbs
't feel like driving anywhere then not getting home till 10 or 11 on sunday night
last year was cool, just tripple and ingrid came over
I mean if you guys were around it would be different
willy said our house is only 15 miles from where his wedding will be
i said we should skip the wedding and just hangout
funny how I say this yet Tripple and I polished off a case on Sunday night watching the championship games
he had 2 left over so we started off with that
they have straub at a beer distributer near his place so we picked up a case
I just passed out at his house and walked to work in the morning
did you get any grief for that?
it just kind of worked out
I had to help him move some dressers up to his appartment
and so I was like I am just going to watch the games down there
and rather than catch a 45 min train at 1030 then turn around and train back at 6am I might as well just stay down here
lane kiffin already has a secondary violation at USC
dude, I want a hoagie so bad right now
erin is supposed to chat with the girls about this weekend
and where people are going to stay
but you guys are welcome to sleep at our place
erin was wondering where beth wanted to stay
we talked about it breifly last night
they weren't sure because they hadn't talked to Erin at all yet
I personally would rather stay with you guys
but I am just along for the ride
if we stay at Becky's that means we are completely at her mercy. And we will be up until the party is ova
plus i've never been to her place
so I can't say what it looks like
i ahve the built-in excuse of telling erin i'm tired
plus i can't drink like I normally do anymore
cause I get dehyrated too easily
so they are the older cheaper games which is awesome
i played for like an hour on saturday at my parents
i need to hook it up and get cracking though
I haven't played my ps3 since october I think
but play movies on it alot
so we sent in our list
so fingers crossed on that one
do you guys have a target closing date yet?
I think I have 100 pages left
don't think I like it as much as you
and it got GREAT reviews online
I keep meaning to call you bunk
Its pretty damn good though now that I think about it
I am interested in how it will end
so if you don't like that, it could certainly be seen as boring
it drags a bit but you get a great feel for everything
what are you reading right now?
all about the roots of the Vietnam War
im not sure what I will read next
GAME CHANGE is supposed to be excellent
i read an excerpt in NY Mag
not that that is the end all be all
this book has a lot of industry buzz
i will try to be on time tomorrow
so i need to be in at a good time
